definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: It is more stable than APM, which considerably widens the potential application of NTM.
sentences.chinese: 紐甜甜味純正，比阿斯巴甜穩定，因而應用範圍更廣。

sentences.english: Aspartame has not been shown to have adverse effects on reproductive activity or lactation.
sentences.chinese: 未見阿斯巴甜在生殖行爲和泌乳方面的不良反應。

sentences.english: Aspartame first came on the market 25 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯巴甜於25年前被首次推向市場。

sentences.english: Using aspartame and saccharin may also help purge the urge for real sugar.
sentences.chinese: 使用阿斯巴甜和代糖也有助於消除你對真糖的慾望。

sentences.english: Using aspartame and saccharin may also help purge the urge for real sugar.
sentences.chinese: 使用阿斯巴甜和糖精也有助於消除你對真糖的慾望。

definition: Stevia extract, used as sugar substitute

pinyin: gao1 guo3 tang2 yu4 mi3 tang2 jiang1

definition: see 反式脂肪[fan3 shi4 zhi1 fang2]
